eng: Move to Rinsdale to meet the sheriff

kor: 린스데일과 웨스트빌 사이에서 마차 강도 제임스를 찾기
eng: Find Coach Robber James between Rinsdale and Westville

kor: 인근 목장에서 보호세를 뜯는 코스티건 갱을 저지하기
eng: Stop the Costigan Gang from collecting protection money at a nearby ranch
Move to Westville to meet the sheriff
Duel with the outlaws of Westville
